# yeti-accordion



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property          | Attribute          | Description                                                                                                      | Type       | Default |
| ----------------- | ------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------- | ------- |
| `isWizard`        | `is-wizard`        | Whether or not to use wizard mode, in which you can only open one section at a time, and you have to go in order | `boolean`  | `false` |
| `openIndex`       | `open-index`       | The 0-based index of the open section.                                                                           | `number`   | `0`     |
| `sectionElements` | `section-elements` | A list of the Accordion's yeti-accordion-section child elements                                                  | `NodeList` | `null`  |
| `sections`        | `sections`         | The total number of sections the Accordion has.                                                                  | `number`   | `0`     |
